title: Is that S.S. Lewis from 1942?
subtitle: A widely shared "quota" during the COVID-19 epidemic may have felt timely, but perhaps because it was written in 2020.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The author, S.S. Lewis, wrote a passage in "The Braggy Letters," which includes Satan who wants "to put down business" and Jesus wants to restore family unity.
